info.title: Zoom REST API
info.description:
Zoom exposes REST interfaces which allows the developers and solution providers to manage meetings, users, recordings, settings and get usage reports. These APIs will be useful when you as a solution provider, build your own web portal to front end Zoom services and present as a login point to your end users.

These management APIs are auto-enabled if you have a paid Zoom account. If you don't have a zoom account, go ahead, create a free account and sign up for a 60 days free trial of our developer platform.

post.description: Add a plan for a sub account of the master account on Zoom.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The sub account ID.

parameters.name: plan
parameters.description: Additional Plan. See [Plans](#plans) for more details

post.description: Create a sub account of the master account on Zoom, return the created sub account id and owner id.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: A valid email address. It must be unique in Zoom service. If an email address is existed, a "user existing" error message will be return.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: User’s first name.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: User’s last name.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: User’s password.

parameters.name: enable_share_rc
parameters.description: Enable Share Virtual Room Connector.

parameters.name: share_rc
parameters.description: Virtual Room Connector, multiple value separated by comma.

parameters.name: enable_share_mc
parameters.description: Enable Share Meeting Connector.

parameters.name: share_mc
parameters.description: Meeting Connector, multiple value separated by comma.

parameters.name: pay_mode
parameters.description: Who will pay for this account? 0 means Sub Account Holders Pays, 1 means Master Account Holder Pays.

parameters.name: collection_method
parameters.description: Collection Method? 0 means Automatic (billing online), 1 means Manual (send invoice).

parameters.name: enable_pstn
parameters.description: The value should be true or false, by default is true.

parameters.name: enable_enforce_login
parameters.description: Only signed-in users can join this meeting.

parameters.name: enable_enforce_login_sd
parameters.description: Only signed-in users with specified domains can join meetings.

parameters.name: enforce_login_domains
parameters.description: Domains of signed-in users.

parameters.name: meeting_capacity
parameters.description: Account’ meeting capacity, max of 100.

parameters.name: disable_cmr_reminder
parameters.description: Disable cloud recording reminder.

parameters.name: enable_only_host_download_cmr
parameters.description: Enable Only the host can download cloud recordings.

parameters.name: enable_same_account_access_cmr
parameters.description: Enable Only users on my account can access cloud recordings.

post.description: Delete the sub account.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The sub account ID.

post.description: Get a sub account of the master account on Zoom, return the created sub account id and owner id.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The sub account ID.

post.description: Get plans information for a sub account of the master account on Zoom.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The sub account ID.

post.description: List all the sub account under the master account.
Subscribe plans for a sub account of the master account on Zoom.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The sub account ID.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Sold To Contact’s first name.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Sold To Contact’s last name.

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: Sold To Contact’s phone number.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Sold To Contact’s address.

parameters.name: apt
parameters.description: Sold To Contact’s Apt/Suite.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Sold To Contact’s city.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Sold To Contact’s country. For this parameter value please refer to the id value in country list JSON file

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Sold To Contact’s state. If country value is "US" or "CA", for this parameter value please refer to the id value in state list JSON file

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Sold To Contact’s zip/postal.

parameters.name: plan_base
parameters.description: Base Plan.  See [Plans](#plans) for more details

parameters.name: plan_zoom_rooms
parameters.description: Additional Zoom Rooms Plan.  See [Plans](#plans) for more details

parameters.name: plan_room_connector
parameters.description: Additional H.323/SIP Room Connector Plan.  See [Plans](#plans) for more details

parameters.name: plan_large_meeting
parameters.description: Additional Large Meeting Plan.  See [Plans](#plans) for more details

parameters.name: plan_webinar
parameters.description: Additional Webinar Plan.  See [Plans](#plans) for more details

parameters.name: plan_recording
parameters.description: Additional Cloud Recording Plan.  See [Plans](#plans) for more details

parameters.name: plan_audio
parameters.description: Additional Audio Conferencing Plan.  See [Plans](#plans) for more details

parameters.description: Enable Only users on my account can access cloud recordings.

post.description: Get chat messages for a specified period.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Archived chat messages access token. Admin who has the view privilege of Archived chat messages will get it.

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: Session Id of chat messages.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The amount of records returns within a single API call. Defaults to 30. Max of 30 records.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Used to paginate through large result sets.  A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available chat history list exceeds 100.  The expiration period is 30 minutes.

post.description: Get chat history list for a specified time period.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Archived chat messages access token. Admin who has the view privilege of Archived chat messages will get it.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The amount of records returns within a single API call. Defaults to 30. Max of 30 records.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email query condition.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Used to paginate through large result sets.  A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available chat history list exceeds 100.  The expiration period is 30 minutes.

post.description: Delete recorded meeting either on Zoom cloud or on-premise.

parameters.name: meeting_id
parameters.description: The meeting ID. Example: ucc69C82Q5mTNyCRWE29Aw== Or B9C73AF4-2F36-4399-9337-2091584DBD03

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: The file ID, if given this, will only delete this one file, if not given this, will delete all files of the meeting

post.description: Get the recorded meeting on either Zoom cloud or on-prem.

parameters.name: meeting_id
parameters.description: The meeting ID.

post.description: List all the cloud recording meetings on Zoom.

parameters.name: host_id
parameters.description: Meeting host user ID. Can be any user under this account.

parameters.name: meeting_number
parameters.description: The meeting number.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The meeting start time after this date, MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm a. For example: 11/05/2014 09:05 pm. Use the host’s time zone, if host has not set time zone, will use GMT.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The meeting start time before this date, MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm a.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The amount of records returns within a single API call. Defaults to 30. Max of 300 meetings.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Current page number of returned records. Default to 1.

parameters.name: from

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The meeting start time before this date, MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm a.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The amount of records returns within a single API call. Defaults to 30. Max of 300 meetings.

parameters.name: page_number

post.description: Create a meeting on Zoom, return the created meeting URL

parameters.name: host_id
parameters.description: Meeting host user ID. Can be any user under this account. Cannot be updated after creation.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Meeting type: 1 means instant meeting (Only used for host to start it as soon as created). 2 means normal scheduled meeting. 3 means a recurring meeting with no fixed time. 8 means a recurring meeting with fixed time.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Meeting topic. Max of 300 characters.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Meeting start time in ISO datetime format. For scheduled meeting and recurring meeting with fixed time. Should be UTC time, such as 2012-11-25T12:00:00Z.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Meeting duration (minutes). For scheduled meeting only.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Timezone to format start_time, like "America/Los_Angeles". For scheduled meeting only. For this parameter value please refer to the id value in timezone list JSON file.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Meeting password. Password may only contain the following characters: [a-z A-Z 0-9 @ - _

parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence Meeting Settings. For recurring meeting with fixed time only. See [Recurrence Object](#recurrence-object) for more details.

parameters.name: option_registration
parameters.description: Registration required.

parameters.name: registration_type
parameters.description: Registration type. 1 means Attendees register once and can attend any of the occurrences, 2 means Attendees need to register for each occurrence to attend, 3 means Attendees register once and can choose one or more occurrences to attend. For recurring meeting with fixed time only.

parameters.name: option_jbh
parameters.description: Join meeting before host start the meeting. Only for scheduled or recurring meetings.

parameters.name: option_start_type
parameters.description: Meeting start type. Can be "video" or "screen_share". (deprecated)

parameters.name: option_host_video
parameters.description: Start video when host join meeting.

parameters.name: option_participants_video
parameters.description: Start video when participants join meeting.

parameters.name: option_cn_meeting
parameters.description: Host meeting in China.

parameters.name: option_in_meeting
parameters.description: Host meeting in India.

parameters.name: option_audio
parameters.description: Meeting audio options. Can be "both", "telephony", "voip".

parameters.name: option_enforce_login
parameters.description: Only signed-in users can join this meeting.

parameters.name: option_enforce_login_domains
parameters.description: Only signed-in users with specified domains can join meetings.

parameters.name: option_alternative_hosts
parameters.description: Alternative hosts.

parameters.name: option_alternative_host_ids
parameters.description: Alternative hosts IDs.

parameters.name: option_use_pmi
parameters.description: Use Personal Meeting ID. Only for scheduled meetings.

parameters.name: option_auto_record_type
parameters.description: Automatically record type. Can be "local", "cloud" or "none".

post.description: Delete a meeting on Zoom, return the deleted meeting ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Meeting ID.

parameters.name: host_id
parameters.description: Meeting host user ID. Can be any user under this account.

parameters.name: occurrence_id

post.description: End a meeting on Zoom, return the deleted meeting ID.

parameters.name: id

post.description: Lists the live meetings on Zoom.
Register for a meeting.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Meeting ID.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: A valid email address.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: User’s first name.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: User’s last name.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country. For this parameter value please refer to the id value in country list JSON file

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Zip/Postal Code.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State/Province.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Phone.

parameters.name: industry
parameters.description: Industry.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: Organization.

parameters.name: job_title
parameters.description: Job Title.

parameters.name: purchasing_time_frame
parameters.description: Purchasing Time Frame, should be "Within a month", "1-3 months", "4-6 months", "More than 6 months", "No timeframe".

parameters.name: role_in_purchase_process
parameters.description: Role in Purchase Process, should be "Decision Maker", "Evaluator/Recommender", "Influencer", "Not involved".

parameters.name: comments
parameters.description: Questions & Comments.

parameters.name: custom_questions
parameters.description: Custom Questions, should be JSON format: [{"title":"field_name1","value":"xxx"},{"title":"field_name2","value":"xxx"}].

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language setting of email. This value should be "en-US", "en", "zh-CN", "zh", "en-ES", "es", "fr-FR" or "fr".

parameters.name: occurrence_ids
parameters.description: Occurrence IDs, could get this value from Meeting Get API.

post.description: Update meeting info on Zoom via meeting ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Meeting ID.

parameters.name: host_id
parameters.description: Meeting host user ID. Can be any user under this account. Used to retrieve a meeting, cannot be updated.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Meeting type: 1 means instant meeting (Only used for host to start it as soon as created). 2 means normal scheduled meeting. 3 means a recurring meeting with no fixed time. 8 means a recurring meeting with fixed time.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Meeting topic. Max of 300 characters.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Meeting start time in ISO datetime format. For scheduled meeting only. Should be UTC time, such as 2012-11-25T12:00:00Z.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Meeting duration (minutes). For scheduled meeting only.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Timezone to format start_time, like "America/Los_Angeles". For scheduled meeting only. For this parameter value please refer to the id value in timezone list JSON file.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Meeting password. Password may only contain the following characters: [a-z A-Z 0-9 @ - _

parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence Meeting Settings. For recurring meeting with fixed time only. See [Recurrence Object](#recurrence-object) for more details.

parameters.name: option_registration
parameters.description: Registration required.

parameters.name: registration_type
parameters.description: Registration type. 1 means Attendees register once and can attend any of the occurrences, 2 means Attendees need to register for each occurrence to attend, 3 means Attendees register once and can choose one or more occurrences to attend. For recurring meeting with fixed time only.

parameters.name: option_jbh
parameters.description: Join meeting before host start the meeting. Only for scheduled or recurring meetings.

parameters.name: option_start_type
parameters.description: Meeting start type. Can be "video" or "screen_share". (deprecated)

parameters.name: option_host_video
parameters.description: Start video when host join meeting.

parameters.name: option_participants_video
parameters.description: Start video when participants join meeting.

parameters.name: option_cn_meeting
parameters.description: Host meeting in China.

parameters.name: option_in_meeting
parameters.description: Host meeting in India.

parameters.name: option_audio
parameters.description: Meeting audio options. Can be "both", "telephony", "voip".

parameters.name: option_enforce_login
parameters.description: Only signed-in users can join this meeting.

parameters.name: option_enforce_login_domains
parameters.description: Only signed-in users with specified domains can join meetings.

parameters.name: option_alternative_hosts
parameters.description: Alternative hosts.

parameters.name: option_alternative_host_ids
parameters.description: Alternative hosts IDs.

parameters.name: option_use_pmi
parameters.description: Use Personal Meeting ID. Only for scheduled meetings.

post.description: Approve pending registrants on Zoom Webinar.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Webinar ID.

parameters.name: host_id
parameters.description: Webinar host user ID. Can be any user who enabled webinar under this account.

parameters.name: registrant_ids
parameters.description: Pending approval registrant ids.

post.description: Create a webinar on Zoom, return the created webinar start and join URL.

parameters.name: host_id
parameters.description: Webinar host user ID. Can be any user under this account. Cannot be updated after creation.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Webinar topic. Max of 300 characters.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: 5 webinar, 6 recurrence webinar, 9 recurring webinar(With Fixed Time)

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Webinar start time in ISO datetime format. For scheduled webinar only. Should be UTC time, such as 2012-11-25T12:00:00Z.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Webinar duration (minutes). For scheduled webinar only.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Timezone to format start_time, like "America/Los_Angeles". For scheduled Webinar only. For this parameter value please refer to the id value in timezone list JSON file.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Webinar password. Password may only contain the following characters: [a-z A-Z 0-9 @ - _

parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description:
Recurrence Webinar Settings. For recurring webinar with fixed time only.

"type": Recurrence Webinar Type. 1 means Daily, 2 means Weekly, 3 means Monthly.
"repeat_interval": Recurrence Webinar Repeat Interval. Defaults to 1. For a Daily Webinar, max of 90. For a Weekly Webinar, max of 12. For a Monthly Webinar, max of 3.
"weekly_days": Recurrence Webinar Occurs on week days, multiple value separated by comma. 1 means Sunday, 2 means Monday, 3 means Tuesday, 4 means Wednesday, 5 means Thursday, 6 means Friday, 7 means Saturday.
"monthly_day": Recurrence Webinar Occurs on a month day. The value range is from 1 to 31.
"monthly_week": Recurrence Webinar Occurs on the week of a month. -1 means Last week, 1 means First week, 2 means Second week, 3 means Third week, 4 means Fourth week.
"monthly_week_day": Recurrence Webinar Occurs on the week day of a month. A single value: 1 means Sunday, 2 means Monday, 3 means Tuesday, 4 means Wednesday, 5 means Thursday, 6 means Friday, 7 means Saturday.
"end_times": Recurrence Webinar End occurrences times. Defaults to 1. Max of 50.
"end_date_time": Recurrence Webinar End Date. Should be UTC time, such as 2012-11-25T12:00:00Z.

parameters.name: approval_type
parameters.description: Approval type. 0 means Automatically Approve. 1 means Manually Approve. 2 means No Registration Required.

parameters.name: registration_type
parameters.description: Registration type. 1 means Attendees register once and can attend any of the occurrences, 2 means Attendees need to register for each occurrence to attend, 3 means Attendees register once and can choose one or more occurrences to attend. For recurring meeting with fixed time only.

parameters.name: agenda
parameters.description: Webinar description.

parameters.name: option_audio
parameters.description: Webinar audio options. Can be "both", "telephony", "voip".

parameters.name: option_host_video
parameters.description: Start video when host join Webinar.

parameters.name: option_panelist_video
parameters.description: Start video when panelist join Webinar.

parameters.name: option_practice_session
parameters.description: Enable Practice Session.

parameters.name: option_enforce_login
parameters.description: Only signed-in users can join this Webinar.

parameters.name: option_enforce_login_domains
parameters.description: Only signed-in users with specified domains can join Webinar.

parameters.name: option_alternative_hosts
parameters.description: Alternative hosts.

parameters.name: option_alternative_host_ids
parameters.description: Alternative hosts IDs.

parameters.name: option_auto_record_type
parameters.description: Automatically record type. Can be "local", "cloud" or "none".

parameters.name: panelists
parameters.description: Webinar Panelists, should be JSON format: [{"name":"xxx","email":"test1@zoom.us"}, {"name":"xxx","email":"test2@zoom.us"}].

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language setting of email to panelists. This value should be "en-US", "en", "zh-CN", "zh", "en-ES", "es", "fr-FR" or "fr".

post.description: Delete a webinar on Zoom, return the deleted webinar ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Webinar ID.

parameters.name: host_id
parameters.description: webinar host user ID. Can be any user who enabled webinar under this account.

parameters.name: occurrence_id
parameters.description: Occurrence ID, could get this value from Webinar Get API.

parameters.name: registrant_ids
parameters.description: Webinar registrant IDs, separated by comma. Max of 15 registrants.

post.description: Register for a webinar

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Webinar ID.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: A valid email address.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: User’s first name.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: User’s last name.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country. For this parameter value please refer to the id value in country list JSON file

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Zip/Postal Code.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State/Province.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Phone.

parameters.name: industry
parameters.description: Industry.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: Organization.

parameters.name: job_title
parameters.description: Job Title.

parameters.name: purchasing_time_frame
parameters.description: Purchasing Time Frame, should be "Within a month", "1-3 months", "4-6 months", "More than 6 months", "No timeframe".

parameters.name: role_in_purchase_process
parameters.description: Role in Purchase Process, should be "Decision Maker", "Evaluator/Recommender", "Influencer", "Not involved".

parameters.name: comments
parameters.description: Questions & Comments.

parameters.name: custom_questions
parameters.description: Custom Questions, should be JSON format: [{"title":"field_name1","value":"xxx"},{"title":"field_name2","value":"xxx"}].

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language setting of email. This value should be "en-US", "en", "zh-CN", "zh", "en-ES", "es", "fr-FR" or "fr".

parameters.name: occurrence_ids
parameters.description: Occurrence IDs, could get this value from Webinar Get API.

post.description: Update Webinar info on Zoom via Webinar ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Webinar ID.

parameters.name: host_id
parameters.description: Webinar host user ID. Can be any user under this account. Cannot be updated after creation.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Webinar topic. Max of 300 characters.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: 5 webinar, 6 recurrence webinar, 9 recurring webinar(With Fixed Time)

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Webinar start time in ISO datetime format. For scheduled webinar only. Should be UTC time, such as 2012-11-25T12:00:00Z.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Webinar duration (minutes). For scheduled webinar only.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Timezone to format start_time, like "America/Los_Angeles". For scheduled Webinar only. For this parameter value please refer to the id value in timezone list JSON file.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Webinar password. Password may only contain the following characters: [a-z A-Z 0-9 @ - _

parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description:
Recurrence Webinar Settings. For recurring webinar with fixed time only.

"type": Recurrence Webinar Type. 1 means Daily, 2 means Weekly, 3 means Monthly.
"repeat_interval": Recurrence Webinar Repeat Interval. Defaults to 1. For a Daily Webinar, max of 90. For a Weekly Webinar, max of 12. For a Monthly Webinar, max of 3.
"weekly_days": Recurrence Webinar Occurs on week days, multiple value separated by comma. 1 means Sunday, 2 means Monday, 3 means Tuesday, 4 means Wednesday, 5 means Thursday, 6 means Friday, 7 means Saturday.
"monthly_day": Recurrence Webinar Occurs on a month day. The value range is from 1 to 31.
"monthly_week": Recurrence Webinar Occurs on the week of a month. -1 means Last week, 1 means First week, 2 means Second week, 3 means Third week, 4 means Fourth week.
"monthly_week_day": Recurrence Webinar Occurs on the week day of a month. A single value: 1 means Sunday, 2 means Monday, 3 means Tuesday, 4 means Wednesday, 5 means Thursday, 6 means Friday, 7 means Saturday.
"end_times": Recurrence Webinar End occurrences times. Defaults to 1. Max of 50.
"end_date_time": Recurrence Webinar End Date. Should be UTC time, such as 2012-11-25T12:00:00Z.

parameters.name: approval_type
parameters.description: Approval type. 0 means Automatically Approve. 1 means Manually Approve. 2 means No Registration Required.

parameters.name: registration_type
parameters.description: Registration type. 1 means Attendees register once and can attend any of the occurrences, 2 means Attendees need to register for each occurrence to attend, 3 means Attendees register once and can choose one or more occurrences to attend. For recurring meeting with fixed time only.

parameters.name: agenda
parameters.description: Webinar description.

parameters.name: option_audio
parameters.description: Webinar audio options. Can be "both", "telephony", "voip".

parameters.name: option_host_video
parameters.description: Start video when host join Webinar.

parameters.name: option_panelist_video
parameters.description: Start video when panelist join Webinar.

parameters.name: option_practice_session
parameters.description: Enable Practice Session.

parameters.name: option_enforce_login
parameters.description: Only signed-in users can join this Webinar.

parameters.name: option_enforce_login_domains
parameters.description: Only signed-in users with specified domains can join Webinar.

parameters.name: option_alternative_hosts
parameters.description: Alternative hosts.

parameters.name: option_alternative_host_ids
parameters.description: Alternative hosts IDs.

parameters.name: option_auto_record_type
parameters.description: Automatically record type. Can be "local", "cloud" or "none".

parameters.name: panelists
parameters.description: Webinar Panelists, should be JSON format: [{"name":"xxx","email":"test1@zoom.us"}, {"name":"xxx","email":"test2@zoom.us"}].

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language setting of email to panelists. This value should be "en-US", "en", "zh-CN", "zh", "en-ES", "es", "fr-FR" or "fr".
